## 1. Selection of cluster 0
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(Seurat)
library(patchwork)
library(tidyverse)
library(sleepwalk)
library(gridExtra)
library(future)
library(reshape2)
library(reticulate)
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(stringr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(grid)
library(cowplot)
library(ggsignif)
library(DT)
library(Cairo)
library(snakecase)
library(glue)

setwd("D:/Michael/git_check/tils")
# setwd("C:/Users/michael monsonego/Documents/tils") #M# update between computers(git)

x1=4.6
T_cells = readRDS("objects/tils_all_.45_integrgate_annotated.rds")
DimPlot(T_cells, reduction = "tsne",
                       repel = T, label = TRUE, label.size = 5)

clus_1= subset(x=T_cells, idents= "1") 
table(clus_1$orig.ident)
table(clus_1$seurat_clusters)

DefaultAssay(clus_1)
DefaultAssay(clus_1) <- "RNA"

#M# is it correct to put assay="RNA"?
clus_1 = NormalizeData(clus_1,assay = "RNA",normalization.method = "LogNormalize", scale.factor = 10000) #M# not working. wonder why
clus_1 = FindVariableFeatures(clus_1,,assay = "RNA", selection.method = "vst", nfeatures = 2000) 

DefaultAssay(clus_1) <- "integrated"

clus_1 = ScaleData(clus_1, verbose = FALSE)
clus_1 = RunPCA(clus_1, npcs = 30, verbose = FALSE)
DimPlot(clus_1, reduction = "pca", group.by="Treatment", cols = c("#FDCDAC", "#B3E2CD"), pt.size=1.1)
ElbowPlot(clus_1, ndims = 30) + theme_classic()
ggsave(file = "figures/data_prep_clus1/elbow_plot.png", dpi=300, width=10, height=10)

clus_1 <- FindNeighbors(clus_1, reduction = "pca", dims = 1:??) #M# choose ?
clus_1 = RunTSNE(clus_1, dims = 1:??)
#M# clus_1 = RunUMAP(clus_1, dims = 1:18)

res_seq <- c(.05,.3, .35, .4, .45, .5)
for(res in res_seq){
  clus_1.res_test <- FindClusters(clus_1, resolution = res)
  
  res_tSNE  <- DimPlot(clus_1.res_test, reduction = "tsne",
                       repel = T, label = TRUE, label.size = 5) +
    theme(legend.position = "none") + 
    plot_annotation(title = paste("Res of", res))
  assign(paste0("tSNE_",res), res_tSNE)
}

tSNE_ls <- list(tSNE_0.05,tSNE_0.3,tSNE_0.35,tSNE_0.4,tSNE_0.45,tSNE_0.5)
all_tSNE <- plot_grid(tSNE_0.05,tSNE_0.3,tSNE_0.35,tSNE_0.4,tSNE_0.45,tSNE_0.5, ncol = 3) 
ggsave(all_tSNE,filename = 'figures/data_prep_clus1/tils_0_??_dim_res_test.png', dpi=300, height=10, width=16)

clus_1 <- FindClusters(clus_1, resolution = ??)
saveRDS(clus_1, file = "objects/tils_1_.??.rds")
clus_1 <- readRDS("objects/)
```



Lineage identification
### a. T cells
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache= TRUE, fig.width=24, fig.height= 16}
Ts <- c('Cd4', 'Cd8a', 'Cd3d','Cd3e','Cd3g',"PTPRC")
Ts <- toupper(Ts)
FeaturePlot(clus_1, features = Ts, order=TRUE,pt.size=1, reduction="tsne", ncol=3)
ggsave(file = "figures/data_prep_clus1/features_T.png", dpi=300, width=30, height=20)
```
 Finding differentially expressed features (cluster biomarkers)
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache= TRUE, fig.width=12, fig.height= 28}
clus_1.markers = FindAllMarkers(clus_1, only.pos = TRUE, min.pct = 0.25, logfc.threshold = 0.25, assay = "RNA")

Top50Markers_T =
  clus_1.markers %>%
  group_by(cluster) %>%
  top_n(n = 50, wt = avg_log2FC) %>%
  as.data.frame %>% 
  arrange(cluster,-avg_log2FC)
write_csv(Top50Markers_T, "Excels/cluster1_analysis_DE genes.csv")

clus_1.markers %>%
    group_by(cluster) %>%
    top_n(n = 10, wt = avg_log2FC) -> top10_T
DoHeatmap(clus_1, features = top10_T$gene) + NoLegend() + scale_fill_gradientn(colors = c("blue", "white", "red"))
ggsave(file = "figures/data_prep_clus1/T cells markers - heatmap.png", dpi=300, width=12, height=20)
```
